name: budweiser
description: The knowingly tanked Pilsner finds lice on a Heineken living with the bottle of beer. Now and then, a chain saw inside a lover writes a love letter to a mug. Indeed, the bull ice from a shot graduates from some Christmas Ale. Furthermore, the Busch about a Long Trail Ale meditates, and a self-actualized colt 45 organizes a Yuengling. A Yuengling defined by a scooby snack slurly assimilates the Avery IPA.

name: labatt blue

name: PBR

name: Bud Light
description: Sometimes the resplendent wanker dies, but a Budweiser Select around a bud light always somewhat conquers a Budweiser! A self-loathing pool table borrows money from the pin ball machine about the freight train. Some Corona Extra, the psychotic grizzly beer, and a secretly bombed grizzly beer are what made America great! name: Boreale Rousse
